result.execSummary:
The defendant Deris M Reeves was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Costs to be paid as a condition of probation along with fine from case 15CT0590.

No Contact with Siegfried M. or Samantha B. Obtain a vailid driver's license. No use or possession of illegal drugs or drug paraphernalia.  Follow through with any treatment or counseling recommended by agent. 
  Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided,   immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.
  If probation is revoked and a prison term is not ordered, or if probation is discharged/terminated, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and government entities for outstanding financial obligations.  Collection may include income assignment.

records.addlTxt: Wis. Dept. of Corrections notice of case status change received.  Outstanding financial obligations have been converted to a civil judgment.

ADDRESS INFO for Deris M Reeves
Current: 937 W Pierce St, Milwaukee, WI 53204 United States  (Effective: 11-02-2017)
Prior: PO Box 1627, Waukesha, WI 53187 United States
Notice of Case Status Change - Revoked - Sentenced to Jail/HOC
with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Defendant Deris M Reeves in court with Attorney Nicholas Martinez.  Michele W. Hulgaard appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant enters a no contest plea to Count #1.  Court performs plea colloquy and finds Defendant guilty of Count #1.  State gives sentencing recommendations.  Attorney Martinez makes statements regarding sentencing.  Defendant makes statements.  Court sentences the Defendant to the following:

COUNT #1:  IMPOSED AND STAYED SENTENCE OF:   

90 DAYS HUBER (CREDIT - 22 days)

TERM OF PROBATION:  1 YEAR

CONDITIONS OF PROBATON:  
____No Use or Possession of illegal drugs/drug paraphernalia 
____Follow through with any treatment and/or counseling recommended by Agent;
____No contact with: Siegfried M. or Samantha B.
____Obtain a valid driver's license

COSTS:  $243.00 & $200.00 DNA surcharge (to be paid out of cash bail posted and remainder due as a condition of probation)

** Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.**

Defendant Deris M Reeves in court with Attorney Nicholas Martinez for Attorney Jess Martinez.  David John Behm appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for February 1, 2016 at 03:00 pm.

Defendant Deris M Reeves in court, in custody, with Attorney Nicholas Martinez.   Kevin Michael Osborne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
